description: Read or write files from the computer that runs n8n

properties.name: info
properties.displayName: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

options.name: Read File(s) From Disk
options.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

options.name: Write File to Disk
options.description: Create a binary file on the computer that runs n8n
